mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wallet ( num, coinCode, coinCount, averageBuyPrice, buyPrice, resultPrice, resultPL, profitRate) VALUES ( #{num}, #{coinCode}, #{coinCount}, #{averageBuyPrice}, #{buyPrice}, #{resultPrice}, #{resultPL}, #{profitRate} );

INSERT INTO asset ( num, userSeed, userTotalSeed, totalBuyPrice, totalValuePrice, totalValuePL, totalValueRate ) VALUES ( #{num}, #{userSeed}, #{userTotalSeed}, #{totalBuyPrice}, #{totalValuePrice}, #{totalValuePL}, #{totalValueRate} );
